snippet: Gov. Pete Wilson has formally terminated enforcement of a California law giving preferences in state contracting to businesses  owned by minorities and women.    Mr. Wilson, a Republican, had led the campaign to end affirmative action programs but...
lead_paragraph: Gov. Pete Wilson has formally terminated enforcement of a California law giving preferences in state contracting to businesses owned by minorities and women. Mr. Wilson, a Republican, had led the campaign to end affirmative action programs but said he could not end them until an appellate court ruled them unconstitutional.
abstract: Gov Pete Wilson formlaly terminates enforcement of California law giving preferences in state contracting to businesses owned by women and minorities (S)

headline.main: National News Briefs; California Formally Ends Contract Preferences
